hero.subtitle: Simple AI assistant that turns your daily chat observations into clear patterns that doctors might miss
hero.hoverInstruction: Hover over cards to learn how each feature works

benefits.chat: Just write in chat - no need to fill out forms and search for buttons
benefits.notifications: Don't miss medications and important measurements
benefits.reports: Come to your doctor with ready reports and charts
benefits.symptoms: Record symptoms in simple language as in chat
benefits.therapy: Track treatment effectiveness and side effects
benefits.analysis: Find hidden connections between lifestyle and symptoms
benefits.goals: Focus AI on what matters to you

mechanism.chat: Write 'set a reminder for methotrexate at 8:00' or 'joints hurt today' - AI will understand the command, clarify details and perform the action itself: record a symptom, set a notification or add data to the chart.
mechanism.notifications: AI learns your routine and reminds you about medications 15 minutes before your usual intake time. Tracks misses and warns about interactions.
mechanism.reports: We automatically collect all your data for the period and generate a PDF report with symptom charts, therapy effectiveness and identified patterns.
mechanism.symptoms: Write 'headache' or 'joints ache in the morning' - AI recognizes 67 symptoms, assesses intensity and links them with timestamps for analysis.
mechanism.therapy: We build symptom charts before and after medication intake, calculate improvement percentage, track side effects and their frequency.
mechanism.analysis: We compare 247 parameters: sleep, nutrition, stress, activity, weather. Find patterns like 'coffee + lack of sleep = migraine after 6 hours'.
mechanism.goals: Set a goal like 'improve sleep' or 'reduce side effects' ‚Äî AI will analyze data considering your priorities, track progress and give personalized recommendations to achieve the goal.

benefits.title: Turn disease struggle into conscious health management
benefits.subtitle: From stress and uncertainty to control and understanding. Here's what will change in your life with Remedia:

0.title: Regain control over your health
0.description: From a patient who just follows instructions to an expert who understands their body and manages their condition

1.title: Stop guessing ‚Äî get personalized answers
1.description: Stop searching for what works through trial and error. Get data specifically about your body

2.title: Become your doctor's partner, not just a patient
2.description: Turn stressful doctor visits into productive expert meetings

0.title: What does this mean for you?
Finally move towards your goals, not abstract "norms"
0.description: Want to improve sleep, reduce side effects or return to workouts? Don't follow generic programs - achieve what matters specifically to you

1.title: See progress where you used to see only failures
1.description: Did it seem like treatment wasn't working before? Our charts will show even small improvements that motivate you to continue

2.title: Stop spending mental energy on constant health thoughts
2.description: Free up mental space - trust routine to AI, and leave energy for life, hobbies and loved ones

0.title: Prevent flare-ups, don't fight consequences
0.description: Noticed that poor health is always 'sudden'? AI will learn to recognize your unique signals and warn you in advance

1.title: Have you tried something that helps others but not you?
1.description: That's normal! Every body is unique. Remedia will find what works specifically for you, not 'everyone with this diagnosis'

2.title: Stop keeping a million health details in your head
2.description: Did I take the pill? When did the pain start? Forget this stress - AI remembers everything and works even when you rest

0.title: Stop wasting time trying to remember everything from recent months
0.description: Come with ready reports instead of chaotic 'well, generally, somewhere a couple weeks ago...'

1.title: Help your doctor make the best decision based on complete picture
1.description: Give the specialist not fragmentary complaints, but structured data - this changes treatment quality

2.title: Change communication dynamics from 'patient-doctor' to 'problem-solving partners'
2.description: Feel more confident when you come not with a problem, but with data to solve it

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything important to know before starting to use

0.question: Does this replace a doctor?
0.answer: No, it's a tool for better interaction with your doctor. We help collect and analyze data so you can provide your doctor with a complete picture of your condition.

1.question: Are my medical data safe?
1.answer: All data is encrypted and stored anonymously. We comply with medical ethics and the federal law 'On Personal Data'. Your confidentiality is our priority.

2.question: How much does it cost?
2.answer: Basic features are free. Premium analytics with extended reports will be available by subscription after launch.

3.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
3.answer: No! The interface is intuitive. You can record symptoms by voice, and AI will conduct all the analysis itself.

4.question: How quickly will I see results?
4.answer: AI finds the first patterns within 1-2 weeks of use. A complete picture forms over 1-2 months of regular record keeping.

5.question: Can it be used for other diseases?
5.answer: Currently focused on rheumatoid diseases. In the future, we plan to expand to other chronic diseases.

forEveryone.title: For Everyone üéØ
forEveryone.content: Are you healthy or don't have rheumatoid arthritis? No problem! We're starting with a focus on chronic diseases, but plan to help absolutely everyone in health management.

missionControl.title: Control, Not Tracker üéØ
missionControl.content: We're creating not "another symptom tracker", but a tool that returns a sense of control over one's own life with a chronic illness.

tokenEconomy.title: Token Economy ü™ô
tokenEconomy.content: Did you know that the medical data market is valued at $5 billion, but patients providing valuable information daily get nothing for it? We're changing this paradigm: first within the app, then worldwide!

founderStory.title: Founder Story üí´
founderStory.content: The founder spent 6 months on 30+ interviews with patients and doctors and spent about a thousand hours at the computer before announcing an MVP created without external investments!

digitalTwin.title: Digital Twin üß†
digitalTwin.content: On a digital twin, new drugs can be tested in just days, which currently takes decades. From symptom diary to predictive medicine of the future!

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First üõ°Ô∏è
privacyFirst.content: Data collected in the app is anonymized and used to advance science and healthcare. You're laying the foundation for the health of future generations!

patientPower.title: Patient Power üí™
patientPower.content: Instead of being passive observers, patients become active participants in research. Your data - your voice in the medicine of the future!

aiRevolution.title: AI Revolution in Medicine ü§ñ
aiRevolution.content: Only 3% of medical data is used for AI research today. We're opening access to the remaining 97%, accelerating drug development by 10 times!

personalizedMedicine.title: Personalized Medicine üß¨
personalizedMedicine.content: Soon treatment will be selected not by average protocols where patients don't have unique features, but based on your unique data. We're building this future today!

healthEcosystem.title: Health Ecosystem üè•
healthEcosystem.content: We're building not an app, but a whole ecosystem: patients + –≤—Ä–∞—á–∏ + –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ + —Ñ–∞—Ä–º–∞–∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏. –í—Å–µ –≤–º–µ—Å—Ç–µ –º—ã —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–µ–µ!

scenarios.1: Good morning! How are you feeling today?
scenarios.2: Hello. Not so good, joints hurt...
scenarios.3: I understand. Tell me, what exactly is bothering you? This will help us build a complete picture and find the path to stable remission!
scenarios.4: Especially the wrists, stiffness in the morning
scenarios.5: Sorry to hear that. Let's assess the intensity of pain in your wrists on a scale from 1 to 10.
scenarios.7: Got it. What kind of pain is it?
scenarios.9: Thank you for the detailed description! Recorded dull pain in wrists, intensity 7/10. This will help us track dynamics and select optimal therapy.
scenarios.10: Have you taken any medications today?
scenarios.11: Yes, took methotrexate yesterday as usual
scenarios.12: Got it! Let's add methotrexate to your medication schedule. Is it 15 mg once a week?
scenarios.14: ‚úÖ Excellent! Set up a reminder for every Tuesday at 9:00. Will also track therapy effectiveness.
scenarios.15: üîî Reminder: Time to take Methotrexate 15 mg
scenarios.17: Excellent! Recorded Methotrexate intake. Keep it up - regular intake is key to achieving remission!
scenarios.18: üéâ I have an interesting finding for you! Analyzing your data for the last 3 months...
scenarios.19: Noticed a pattern: joint pain decreases by 30% within 48 hours after taking methotrexate. This is an excellent result!
scenarios.20: Also see that reducing nightshades in your diet enhances this effect by another 15%.
scenarios.21: üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è I see you have an appointment with a rheumatologist tomorrow. Prepare a report for the doctor?
scenarios.23:
üìã Here's what we have:

‚Ä¢ Average pain intensity: 6.2/10
‚Ä¢ Methotrexate effectiveness: +30%
‚Ä¢ Well-being improved by 25%
‚Ä¢ No side effects recorded
‚Ä¢ Recommendation: discuss current dosage with doctor
scenarios.24: Report is ready! Don't forget to take it with you to the appointment. Wishing you a successful consultation! üçÄ
